Mission of WealthGenics is to explore all possibilities to multiply our money because we believe that wealth is not only about having a lot of money but it's about having a lot of Options to multiply it.

idea: SOARING REALFINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED is a technology driven real estate service organisation collaborating with leading developers across major markets in India. Founded by professionals from real estate and financial service industry, who design and develop customised delivery models that are instrumental in creating value for developers and clients. Built on the principles of Advice, Create and Nurture, Justo strikes a fine balance between technology with human interactions to effectively create Offline to Online delivery model.
name: SOARING REALFINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: AMPPULSE ELECTRICALS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED started with the vision to create an admirable company focusing on Manufacturing and providing total lighting solutions in specialised lighting,electrical manufacturing services and 3D design solution as per International Standards. We are here to build an enterprise that is more than a business. Amppulse Electricals is known for its Excellent Team Work, Respect for People, Professional Work Ethics with Excellent Knowledge in lighting.Brand Amppulse Electricals committed to serve and add value to the specialized lighting and give the best experience to our respected customers in this new era of smart lighting. We manufacture our products and provide solutions with a personal touch. A bunch of experienced professionals moving forward completely by focusing on Lighting excellence with customer satisfaction and continuous improvement. Our skilled and talented Research and Development Team is always ahead of time to give customers innovative products.
name: AMPPULSE ELECTRICALS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: CRAFT AND COAT PRIVATE LIMITED is started by a team of skilled professionals who are having around decade experience in the field of Civil and Mechanical Industry. We have wide range of specialized testing and experienced team of Engineers , Technicians & chemists provide the most comprehensive range of integrated advisory and technical services. we offer testing and engineering services such as Geotechnical Investigations, Building Material Testing, Non-Destructive Testing. The team is highly focused and dedicated towards providing prompt and thorough solutions to ensure complete satisfaction of the clients.
name: CRAFT AND COAT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Nutshell Creator's Real Estate Advisor is a Private Company incorporated on 30 January 2021. It is classified as a Non-government company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, MUMBAI. It is involved in Real estate activities on a fee or contract basis. [This class includes buying, selling, renting managing, and appraising real estate on a fee or contract basis. This class also includes the service activities provided by Munshi.] Directors of Nutshell Creator's Real Estate Advisor are Nitin Dilip Shinde. Nutshell Creator's Real Estate Advisor Its registered address is M/S 302, B2, Vishwajeet Paradise, Ambernath - Badlpaur Road, Ambernath West, THANE MH 421503 IN. The current status of Nutshell Creator's Real Estate Advisor is Active. The company is also written/known as M/SNutshell Creator's Real Estate Advisor
name: Nutshell Creator's Real Estate Advisor

idea: India’s transport sector is large and diverse; it caters to the needs of 1.39 billion people. Good physical connectivity in the urban and rural areas is essential for economic growth. Since the early 1990s, India's growing economy has witnessed a rise in demand for transport infrastructure and services. As Our Country Have vast land transportation infrastructure, vast coastal area, and manpower, we are planning to take advantage of this opportunity and enter into contracts, agreements, and arrangements with any other person, firm, company, body corporate, or statutory body, on behalf of the Company, for carrying out any of the objects for which the Company is established. To streamline the complete Transport Logistics, technical activities including manpower recruitment, manpower planning, training, and management, commission agent, general commission agent, business aggregator, a mediator in bulk business deals, etc, this will solve the problems like unemployment in our country and nourish the young and innovative talents for their better future. There are a lot of foreign companies that want to invest in this business but due to lack of business infrastructure and entities hesitant to establish their business in this line, Hence by starting this business, we can attract lot more foreign companies to invest in our homegrown services enabling an all-round growth of our economy.
name: MD & NS INTERNATIONAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: IMMORTEX MARKETING PRIVATE LIMITED Power is an responsive yet effective supply chain to harvest suns energy in every possible dimensions and apply it diversely to everything possible
name: IMMORTEX MARKETING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our business is a technology based platform, that will cater to the needs of artists as well as art-collectors. Our objective is to bridge the gap between art creators and art consumers, by providing the right platform to artists, encouraging them to create while assisting them to sell, deliver and get remunerated for their art and at the same time, acting as a one stop shop for all kinds of arts and artists in India, to look out for.
name: SAGA ART PRIVATE LIMITED
